name: PAT_EDU_POINT_REVWD_USER
description: This table extracts the related multiple response item PED-441.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the education record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: REVIEWED_MYPT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the users who have reviewed this education point. Every time a user opens an education point for the first time, this item gets updated
